greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = Sum_{k=0..n} (k!)^2 * abs(Stirling1(n,k)).
program: (PARI) a(n) = sum(k=0, n, k!^2*abs(stirling(n, k, 1))); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Oct 14 2018
(MAGMA) [(&+[Abs(StirlingFirst(n,k))*(Factorial(k))^2: k in [0..n]]): n in [0..20]]; // _G. C. Greubel_, Oct 14 2018
results.author: _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Oct 13 2018
